channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: Emptying two rooms filled with wool, craft materials and elaborate drag queen costumes is one thing. The real challenge for R?is?n is designing two multifunctional rooms with extremely limited space.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Flat Out Fabulous
channel.desc: Whinnie and Tyler are back in Bristol meeting Ciaran, Keith, Fergal and Eden, four friends that are in need of a new living room.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: People seeking to get away from city life ask the experts to help them find their perfect country home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: We revisit a standout coastal and country homes that inspired us, celebrating the vision of South Africa's top design talents.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Homes Revealed
channel.desc: This week we tour a European inspired chateau and a newly renovated home in Beverly Hills, California. We also travel to Melbourne in Australia for a look inside this custom designed home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Virtually Home
channel.desc: People with interior design dilemmas are offered a helping hand by some of the UKs top interior designers, alongside the use of some cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: We visit a stunning coastal home in Queensland that's about to go under the hammer after being saved from the wrecking ball for more than 20 years.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Good Food Kitchen
channel.desc: Danielle shows us how to spice up our chicken. Rosheen creates a traditional dish and Julia's makes chocolate ricotta cake. Later Adam shows us a recipe that involves no cooking.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: School Night Dinners
channel.desc: In this episode, we're making fish and chips, with a healthy twist. Then we tactically use veg to make sure your kids get their 5 a day, featuring, Ciara Attwell.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Raw Vegan Not Gross
channel.desc: Laura gets her hands on a spiralizer for some zucchini noodles, makes some raw energy balls, and breaks out of the studio to go on a California road trip.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Grand Designs UK
channel.desc: Grand Designs UK, hosted by designer and writer Kevin McCloud, follows intrepid homebuilders as they pursue their architectural dreams.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: We visit the Lifestyle Home Garden Show 2018 to find what inspired this year's design. Linda Galvad discusses companion plants for your veggies.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.title: Eyes for the Job
channel.desc: Chris Judge and Rebekah Higgs give tips for home improvement and accessibility tips.
